timeline.message: :art: removed reference to ToolOverlay from MapViewTileRenderer in order to keep it loosly coupled

timeline.bodyText: @cygnus-x-1 wouldn't it be better to keep this method as this bit of code is duplicated twice within this class? It can be instead private though.
timeline.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText: Perhaps - there are other code blocks just like it all throughout MapViewTileRenderer, the whole thing needs a clean up but that feels like a task for another day.
replies.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText: True @cygnus-x-1 but this would be one less we would have had to do.
replies.author: arcturus2
